group_1.textLeft: As the movement to abolish the Festival became@more and more violent...
We, the Youth Association, gathered ourselves@together to discuss it.

group_1.textRight: ...is a festival where people jump into the fire@to welcome and entertain the god, and yet...

group_1.textLeft: It gets called abusive and shit for making people@jump into the fire.
I can't fucking take this.

group_1.textRight: The bastards involved in this abolition movement...
They go around spouting all kinds of bullshit...

group_1.textLeft: Underage drinking, illegal gambling, and now@extortion...
They're blaming our Youth Association for@everything other guys have done.

group_1.textRight: If we don't do something, the Fire Festival will be@forced to end...

group_1.textLeft: Don't sweat that.
Adversity like this is when we as the Youth@Association come together.
Right, everyone?!

group_1.textRight: Damn straight!@We gotta show them we're innocent.
For the honor of the Fire Festival god and the@Hikarizuka Youth Association!

group_1.textLeft: And so, we protested the abolition movement@as we should.

group_1.textRight: When they do it, they do it, right...?!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* That's right.
Nonetheless, with the addition of Takarazaki's@influential people to that movement's core...
The Youth Association became outmatched...

group_1.textRight: No way, no way...! D-d-did you find any other@counter-measures...?!

group_1.textLeft: ...There were none.@We had done all we could do.
At that rate, the Fire Festival would be abolished...
And the Youth Association might've also been@disbanded as a result...
The thought of it haunted me every day.@One day, I had a dream...

group_1.narration: ―San―@Guys...?!@I don't understand... Get out of the fire!!
―Tatsu―@Not yet...!@We gotta welcome the god, or else...!
"I beg you, San...!@Protect the Fire Festival, if nothing else..."
"Protect the god's whereabouts for us@like nothing else matters...!!"

group_1.textLeft: ...Now that I've told you this much, can you guess@what I'm talking about here?

group_1.textRight: Lady San... You protected the Fire Festival, right?@By becoming a Magical Girl...

group_1.textLeft: That's right...
I wished for Kyubey to@"make the Fire Festival remain".
Soon after, the movement to abolish the Festival@died out.

group_1.textRight: But, but, that doesn't make sense...!
If that's what you wished for...
Then, why are there once again rumors about the@Association, and sponsorship losses...
How come the Fire Festival is in trouble again?!

group_1.textLeft: All I could think about was getting out of@the dire straits at the time.
It wasn't like my wish was "I want the Fire Festival@to go on forever".
It's no wonder that we're in this situation again.

group_1.textRight: You risked everything to protect the Festival,@Lady San, and yet...

group_1.textLeft: ...Nevertheless, I did manage to save the@Fire Festival from its biggest crisis.
That's good enough for me.

group_1.textRight: Then, then!@What should we do now, Lady San?!

group_1.textLeft: The prejudice against the Fire Festival and the@Youth Association is ours to change...
The whole fundraising thing this time, too...
